home.title: Fantasea Condo Kamala - Luxury Beachfront Accommodation
home.metaDescription: Experience luxury at Fantasea Condo Kamala. Modern apartments with stunning ocean views, rooftop pool, and prime location near Kamala Beach, Phuket.

rooms.title: Our Rooms
rooms.description: Discover our carefully designed accommodations, each offering comfort and elegance for your perfect stay.
rooms.metaDescription: Explore our range of luxury apartments at Fantasea Condo Kamala - from cozy studios to spacious two-bedroom units, all with modern amenities and stunning views.

roomTypes.name: One-BR Apartment
roomTypes.description: This 27 m² apartment features a pool with a view. The air-conditioned apartment has 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Guests can make meals in the kitchen that has a refrigerator, kitchenware, a microwave and a toaster. Boasting a balcony with garden views, this apartment also features a coffee machine and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The unit has 1 bed.

roomTypes.name: Studio w/ Balcony
roomTypes.description: This 34 m² studio's special feature is the pool with a view. The fully equipped kitchen features a refrigerator, kitchenware, a microwave and a toaster. This air-conditioned studio includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a private bathroom as well as a balcony with mountain views. The unit offers 1 bed.

roomTypes.name: Two-BR Apartment w/ Balcony
roomTypes.description: This 47 m² apartment's standout feature is the pool with a view. This air-conditioned apartment is consisted of of 1 living room, 2 separate bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a shower. In the kitchen, guests will find a refrigerator, kitchenware, a microwave and a toaster. Featuring a balcony with mountain views, this apartment also offers a coffee machine and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The unit offers 2 beds.

location.title: Location & Nearby Attractions
location.description: Discover the perfect location of Fantasea Condo Kamala, surrounded by beautiful beaches, attractions, and local experiences in Phuket.
location.metaDescription: Explore the prime location of Fantasea Condo Kamala - close to Kamala Beach, restaurants, attractions, and transportation in Phuket, Thailand.

locations.name: Feelings Cafe
locations.description: A beautifully designed cafe in Phuket Town, known for its good atmosphere, spacious layout, and many photo spots. Offers food, drinks, and desserts.

locations.name: Chapayom
locations.description: A cafe chain known for Thai tea and beverages, located about 1 km from Kamala Beach.

locations.name: Kamala Beach
locations.description: A 2 km long, family-friendly beach with soft sand, gentle waves, and a laid-back atmosphere. Offers water sports, beach clubs, and sunset views.

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.description: Explore our beautiful accommodations and facilities through our comprehensive photo gallery.
gallery.metaDescription: Browse through our photo gallery showcasing rooms, facilities, and the beautiful surroundings of Fantasea Condo Kamala in Phuket.
